name.label: This is a review byy mee

content.label: This is an amazing game! It‚Äôs so much fun and addicting to play, the only thing that I would say is it‚Äôs annoyingly because you pay $1,000 to save your checkpoint and I had $30,000 and it‚Äôs started me all over with nothing. I think you should be able to pay more money to resume the game. Also why aren‚Äôt there options to give your family food or talk to them? And why can you ONLY be a guy in the game?!? Please get back to me right away thank  you

Omg I love this game but these ads GOT TO GO. Every 5 minutes SOMETIMES 2 theirs an ad. Yes they are only 5 seconds BUT It‚Äôs interrupting the game and it makes me want to throw my phone so bad. GET RID OF THESE ADS IM SERIOUS. Also, once I got the $70,000 house it got kinda boring, It would be more fun if I had more places to rob and the map was bigger and some of the things I rob like the Tv‚Äôs and stuff I would want to keep them and put them in my house instead of selling them for money. Oh and one more thing I want to interact with my family. Like I want to have a choice to go up to my family and have a conversation or go in the backyard and build something for my son.
This game is very fun. Please make more updates though because it‚Äôs fun to explore the new houses. Keep up the good work!

there are absolutely too many adds, it feels like every 5 seconds one comes on. It‚Äôs and absolute TURN OFF for a game. I just downloaded it and was going to give it a try but there‚Äôs an abundance of ads and I‚Äôm not here for it.

The game would be great if the mechanics worked better and weren‚Äôt so glitchy. Stealth is barely important. The police are the worse they will circle your car until you try to leave and then the game does this weird glitch and you have to pay 1000 coins to keep your progress. The game feels like it‚Äôs literally cheating you at times. And don‚Äôt get me started on the ads every 30seconds. It‚Äôs annoying and doesn‚Äôt allow you to get immersed at all. I had to delete it Bc the glitches just got unbearable. But the potential is very high, i even enjoy the story element of it.
It‚Äôs inderect on what you need to do. The police are overpowered and arrest you on a wim, no seriously, they like to arrest you for no reason. Please fix this, it has a lot of potential.
